thumb.name: On My Mind
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EKnow what's%3Cbr%3Eon my mind.%3Cbr%3EChris?%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThe same thing%3Cbr%3Ethat's in my heart %26#151;%3Cbr%3EYOU!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Valentine's Day

thumb.name: Wishing You Peace
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThis Valentine's Day%3Cbr%3Emay be%3Cbr%3Edifficult for you.%3Cbr%3EJoanna.%3Cbr%3Ewith so many different%3Cbr%3Efeelings and memories...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EJust remember that%3Cbr%3EI am thinking of you%3Cbr%3Eand wish you peace of mind.%3Cbr%3Enow and always.

thumb.name: Wonderful Friend
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHeidi.%3Cbr%3EI'm So Glad%3Cbr%3EWe're Friends%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EI like our friendship%3Cbr%3Eand how we have such fun%3Cbr%3Ewhenever we're together.%3Cbr%3EI like the way we understand%3Cbr%3Eeach other's thoughts.%3Cbr%3Eand the way we seem to sense%3Cbr%3Eeach other's feelings.%3Cbr%3EI like knowing%3Cbr%3Ewe'll always be there for each other.%3Cbr%3Eeven if. sometimes.%3Cbr%3Eit's only in thought...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EI want you to know%3Cbr%3Ehow much you mean to me%3Cbr%3Eand how lucky I feel%3Cbr%3E to have a wonderful%3Cbr%3Eand caring friend like you.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Valentine's Day

thumb.name: Hippity-hop!
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EIt's Valentine's Day.%3Cbr%3EJason!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHippity-hop! Hippity-hop!%3Cbr%3ETime to make a special stop%3Cbr%3ETo bring this valentine your way%3Cbr%3EAnd wish you lots of fun today!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E'Hop-ing' It's Great%3Cbr%3Efor a Great Boy%3Cbr%3ELike You

thumb.name: For Someone Special Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWhen I say.%3Cbr%3E'Happy Valentine's Day. Chris.'%3Cbr%3EI'm saying so much more than%3Cbr%3Ethanks from the heart%3Cbr%3Efor all the special moments%3Cbr%3Ewe've shared...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E...I'm saying%3Cbr%3Ethanks for being someone%3Cbr%3Ewho's really special%3Cbr%3Ein my life!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHave a Great%3Cbr%3EValentine's Day

thumb.name: Magic in My Life
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWith Love.%3Cbr%3ECory%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EAll the special moments%3Cbr%3Ethat I love to share with you --%3Cbr%3EThe quiet talks. the laughter.%3Cbr%3Ethoughtful things you say and do...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMake me fall in love with you%3Cbr%3Ea little more each day.%3Cbr%3E You bring more magic to my life%3Cbr%3Ethan words could ever say.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Valentine's Daywith All My Heart

thumb.name: To a Little Lady
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHi. Emily!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EYou're a darling little lady%3Cbr%3EAnd a perfect valentine!%3Cbr%3EThat's why this card%3Cbr%3Eis filled with love%3Cbr%3EIn every single line!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Hearts Day. Honey

thumb.name: You're Both Loved
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EEspecially for Both of You. Tony and Jill%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EA very special Valentine That comes with love in every line%26#133;For all the things. year after year. That make you both so sweet and dear! Happy Valentine's Day%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Good Excuse
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EIt's Valentine's Day. Robin%26#133;%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%26#133;a good excuse to say I'm glad you're part of my world. Happy Valentine's Day%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Hot Little Package Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EEric.%3Cbr%3EOnly the best%3Cbr%3E is good enough%3Cbr%3E for you!%3Cbr%3EThat's why%3Cbr%3E you're getting%3Cbr%3E a very rare gift...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThis hot little package!%3Cbr%3EHappy%3Cbr%3E Valentine's Day%3Cbr%3E from Deborah!%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: My Dreams Come True
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EFrom the sweetness%3Cbr%3Eof your kiss%3Cbr%3Eto the magic%3Cbr%3Eof your touch.%3Cbr%3Eyou are the essence%3Cbr%3Eof romance. Elizabeth...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EFrom the openness%3Cbr%3Eof your sharing%3Cbr%3Eto the beauty of your loving.%3Cbr%3Eyou are the heart and soul%3Cbr%3Eof true passion.%3Cbr%3EFrom the secrets%3Cbr%3Ebehind your smile%3Cbr%3Eto the private world%3Cbr%3Esoftly promised in your eyes.%3Cbr%3Eyou are the endless joy%3Cbr%3Eof discovery...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EFrom the wonder%3Cbr%3Eof your closeness%3Cbr%3Eto the gift of your deepest self.%3Cbr%3Eyou are every one%3Cbr%3Eof my dreams come true.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EI Want You.%3Cbr%3EI Need You.%3Cbr%3EI Love You%3Cbr%3EAlways%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Valentine's Day

thumb.name: You're My Future Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ECindy.%3Cbr%3E I look forward%3Cbr%3Eto whatever%3Cbr%3Ethe future%3Cbr%3Emay hold...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E...as long%3Cbr%3Eas my future%3Cbr%3Eholds you.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Valentine's Day%3Cbr%3E
